properties.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 1 at 4:39PM ChST until January 2 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
properties.description:
...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN TIYAN HAS ISSUED A HIGH SURF
WARNING, WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM THURSDAY. A HIGH SURF
ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 PM FRIDAY.

* WHAT...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS.

* WHERE...ALONG NORTH AND EAST FACING REEFS OF THE MARIANAS. NORTH
FACING REEFS WILL SEE DANGEROUS SURF TONIGHT OF 13 TO 15 FEET.
SURF WILL SUBSIDE TO BETWEEN 11 AND 14 FEET THURSDAY MORNING.
EAST FACING REEFS WILL SEE SURF OF 8 TO 11 FEET. WHILE THIS IS
NOT HAZARDOUS...IT WILL STILL GENERATE DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS.

* WHEN...HIGH SURF WARNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING. HIGH SURF
ADVISORY THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING. HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS
THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON.

* IMPACTS...RIP CURRENTS CAN DRAG EVEN EXPERIENCED SWIMMERS OUT
INTO THE OCEAN.
properties.instruction:
A HIGH SURF WARNING INDICATES THAT DANGEROUS...BATTERING WAVES
WILL POUND THE SHORELINE. THIS WILL RESULT IN LIFE-THREATENING
CONDITIONS.

IF YOU HAVE TO SWIM OUT OF A RIP CURRENT...SWIM PARALLEL TO SHORE
AND BACK TOWARD THE BEACH WHEN POSSIBLE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SWIM
DIRECTLY AGAINST A RIP CURRENT AS YOU WILL TIRE QUICKLY.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM THURSDAY... ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM FRIDAY
